wikipedia_page.main: Eliza Kirk (1812 – around 1856) was an Irish sculptor.

response: He died in 1845 and is interred in Mount Jerome Cemetery, Dublin. His sons, Joseph Robinson Kirk (1821-1894) and William Boyton Kirk (1824-1900), daughter Eliza Kirk (b. 1812) and grandson Thomas Stewart Kirk (1848-1879) were also sculptors.Dictionary of Irish Architects His eldest daughter Mary Anne was a Greek scholar and accomplished musician.RIA, Dictionary of Irish Biography, Dublin, 2008
